sentences.sentence: Follow Highway 41 North, ? mile before Interstate 64 make a left at Rusher Creek.
sentences.translation: 位于交通方便，我们就在国道41号州际公路64分钟内。

sentences.sentence: I told Bob to block the kid to the right too, then run hard left, and I’d throw the ball to him right before the rusher got to me.
sentences.translation: 我让鲍勃也到右边去阻挡9岁的男孩，然后迅速往左边跑，我在对方前锋追上我之前就会把球扔给他。

sentences.sentence: So I told the third man on our team to center the ball, let the rusher come after me, and go block the tall man defending the backfield to the right.
sentences.translation: 我于是告诉我们一方的第三个人将球传中，让对方的前锋来追我，然后他去右边挡住那个高个子后卫。
